TDriverResultSetAdapter<T> Class

Summary

Base Spring.Persistence.Core.Interfaces.IDBResultSet adapter which descendents must override.

Namespace: Spring.Persistence.Core.Base
Inheritance Hierarchy

Syntax
Delphi
type
 TDriverResultSetAdapter<T: TDataSet> = class(TDriverAdapterBase, IDBResultSet)
 end;
